attributes.name: Social Media Manager
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Social Media Manager application for managing multiple social media accounts and campaigns in the Boxel framework. This app should provide unified social media management with content scheduling, analytics tracking, audience engagement, and multi-platform publishing capabilities for individuals and businesses.

## Core Features

### Account Management
- **Multi-Platform Integration**: Connect Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, YouTube, Pinterest
- **Account Switching**: Quick switching between different social accounts
- **Team Collaboration**: Role-based access for team members
- **Brand Management**: Multiple brand account organization
- **Authentication**: Secure OAuth integration with social platforms
- **Account Health**: Monitor connection status and API limits
- **Permissions**: Granular access control for team members
- **Account Grouping**: Organize accounts by client or brand

### Content Creation & Management
- **Content Calendar**: Visual calendar for planning and scheduling
- **Post Composer**: Rich text editor with media upload
- **Template Library**: Reusable post templates and formats
- **Content Categories**: Organize content by type and campaign
- **Hashtag Manager**: Research, save, and organize hashtags
- **Media Library**: Centralized storage for images, videos, GIFs
- **Content Approval**: Review and approval workflows
- **Bulk Operations**: Mass scheduling and editing capabilities

### Scheduling & Publishing
- **Smart Scheduling**: AI-powered optimal posting times
- **Bulk Scheduling**: Upload and schedule multiple posts
- **Queue Management**: Automatic posting from content queues
- **Time Zone Management**: Post at optimal times per audience
- **Recurring Posts**: Schedule repeating content
- **Draft Management**: Save and organize unpublished content
- **Preview Mode**: See how posts appear on each platform
- **Instant Publishing**: Real-time posting capabilities

### Analytics & Reporting
- **Performance Dashboard**: Key metrics across all platforms
- **Engagement Analytics**: Likes, shares, comments, reaches
- **Audience Insights**: Demographics and behavior analysis
- **Content Performance**: Best and worst performing posts
- **Growth Tracking**: Follower and engagement growth over time
- **Competitive Analysis**: Compare performance with competitors
- **Custom Reports**: Branded reports for clients and stakeholders
- **ROI Tracking**: Campaign performance and return on investment

### Engagement Management
- **Unified Inbox**: All messages and comments in one place
- **Response Templates**: Quick replies for common interactions
- **Auto-Moderation**: Automatic spam and inappropriate content filtering
- **Sentiment Analysis**: Monitor brand mentions and sentiment
- **Crisis Management**: Alert system for negative mentions
- **Community Management**: Tools for building and engaging communities
- **Influencer Tracking**: Monitor influencer partnerships
- **User-Generated Content**: Curate and repost customer content

### Campaign Management
- **Campaign Planning**: Multi-platform campaign coordination
- **A/B Testing**: Test different content variations
- **Campaign Analytics**: Track campaign-specific performance
- **Budget Tracking**: Monitor ad spend and organic reach
- **Goal Setting**: Define and track campaign objectives
- **Campaign Templates**: Reusable campaign structures
- **Cross-Platform Coordination**: Ensure consistent messaging
- **Campaign Reporting**: Comprehensive campaign performance reports

## Technical Architecture

### Platform Integrations
- **Facebook Graph API**: Posts, pages, insights, messaging
- **Instagram Basic Display API**: Photos, videos, stories
- **Twitter API v2**: Tweets, direct messages, analytics
- **LinkedIn Marketing API**: Company pages, personal profiles
- **TikTok for Business API**: Video content, analytics
- **YouTube Data API**: Video uploads, channel management
- **Pinterest API**: Pins, boards, analytics
- **Google Analytics**: Website traffic from social media

### Data Management
- **Content Database**: Centralized content storage
- **Analytics Warehouse**: Historical performance data
- **Media CDN**: Fast image and video delivery
- **Backup Systems**: Regular content and data backups
- **Data Export**: Export analytics and content data
- **Compliance**: GDPR and privacy regulation compliance
- **Security**: Encrypted data transmission and storage

### User Interface

### Dashboard Design
- **Overview Dashboard**: Key metrics and quick actions
- **Platform-Specific Views**: Tailored interfaces per social network
- **Dark/Light Themes**: User preference customization
- **Mobile Responsive**: Full functionality on mobile devices
- **Drag-and-Drop**: Intuitive content calendar interaction
- **Real-time Updates**: Live notification and data refresh
- **Customizable Widgets**: Personalized dashboard layouts

### Workflow Automation
- **Auto-Posting**: Queue-based automatic publishing
- **Content Recycling**: Republish evergreen content
- **Hashtag Suggestions**: AI-powered hashtag recommendations
- **Optimal Timing**: Machine learning for best posting times
- **Content Curation**: Automatic discovery of shareable content
- **Engagement Automation**: Auto-like and follow capabilities
- **Report Generation**: Automated weekly/monthly reports
- **Alert Systems**: Notifications for mentions, comments, DMs

### Collaboration Features
- **Team Workspaces**: Separate environments for different teams
- **Role Permissions**: Admin, editor, viewer, approver roles
- **Content Approval**: Multi-stage approval workflows
- **Comments & Annotations**: Team feedback on content
- **Asset Sharing**: Shared media libraries and templates
- **Client Portals**: Branded interfaces for client access
- **Activity Logs**: Track all user actions and changes
- **Version Control**: Track content revisions and changes

## Advanced Features

### AI-Powered Tools
- **Content Generation**: AI-assisted post writing
- **Image Recognition**: Auto-tagging and content categorization
- **Sentiment Analysis**: Automatic mood detection in comments
- **Trend Detection**: Identify trending topics and hashtags
- **Personalization**: Customized content for different audiences
- **Chatbots**: Automated customer service responses
- **Predictive Analytics**: Forecast engagement and reach
- **Content Optimization**: Suggestions for improving posts

### E-commerce Integration
- **Product Catalogs**: Social commerce product management
- **Shoppable Posts**: Direct purchase from social media
- **Inventory Sync**: Real-time product availability
- **Sales Tracking**: Revenue attribution from social media
- **Customer Journey**: Track social media to purchase path
- **Promotional Campaigns**: Discount code distribution
- **Review Management**: Monitor and respond to product reviews

### Advanced Analytics
- **Cohort Analysis**: User behavior over time
- **Attribution Modeling**: Multi-touch attribution analysis
- **Predictive Modeling**: Forecast future performance
- **Competitive Intelligence**: Competitor strategy analysis
- **Influencer ROI**: Measure influencer partnership effectiveness
- **Content Lifecycle**: Track content performance over time
- **Cross-Platform Attribution**: Understand multi-platform impact

## Security & Compliance

### Data Protection
- **End-to-End Encryption**: Secure data transmission
- **Two-Factor Authentication**: Enhanced account security
- **API Rate Limiting**: Prevent abuse and ensure stability
- **Regular Security Audits**: Ongoing security assessments
- **GDPR Compliance**: European data protection standards
- **CCPA Compliance**: California consumer privacy protection
- **SOC 2 Certification**: Enterprise security standards

### Content Safety
- **Content Moderation**: AI and human content review
- **Brand Safety**: Prevent association with inappropriate content
- **Crisis Management**: Rapid response to PR emergencies
- **Compliance Monitoring**: Ensure adherence to platform policies
- **Legal Review**: Content approval for regulated industries
- **Archive Management**: Long-term content storage and retrieval

## Pricing & Monetization

### Subscription Tiers
- **Individual**: Single user, 3 social accounts, basic analytics
- **Professional**: 10 accounts, advanced analytics, team collaboration
- **Business**: 50 accounts, white-label reports, API access
- **Enterprise**: Unlimited accounts, custom integrations, dedicated support

### Add-On Services
- **Premium Analytics**: Advanced reporting and insights
- **Content Creation**: Professional design and copywriting services
- **Managed Services**: Full social media management
- **Custom Integrations**: Bespoke API connections
- **Training & Onboarding**: Professional consultation services

## Success Metrics

### User Engagement
- **Daily Active Users**: Percentage of subscribers using daily
- **Feature Adoption**: Usage rates of different features
- **Session Duration**: Time spent in the application
- **Content Published**: Number of posts scheduled and published
- **Team Collaboration**: Multi-user workspace activity

### Business Impact
- **Customer Retention**: Monthly and annual churn rates
- **Revenue Growth**: Subscription and upsell revenue
- **Customer Satisfaction**: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
- **Support Efficiency**: Response time and resolution rates
- **Market Share**: Position in social media management space

### Platform Performance
- **API Reliability**: Uptime and error rates
- **Page Load Speed**: Application performance metrics
- **Mobile Performance**: iOS and Android app performance
- **Scalability**: Ability to handle increased user load
- **Integration Stability**: Third-party API connection reliability

## Integration Ecosystem

### Marketing Tools
- **Email Marketing**: Mailchimp, Constant Contact, Klaviyo
- **CRM Systems**: Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics
- **Design Tools**: Canva, Adobe Creative Suite
- **Project Management**: Asana, Trello, Monday.com

### E-commerce Platforms
- **Shopify**: Product catalog and sales integration
- **WooCommerce**: WordPress e-commerce connection
- **BigCommerce**: Online store synchronization
- **Magento**: Enterprise e-commerce integration
- **Amazon**: Marketplace listing management

### Content Creation
- **Stock Photos**: Unsplash, Shutterstock, Getty Images
- **Video Editing**: Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro
- **Graphic Design**: Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma
- **AI Writing**: GPT-3, Jasper, Copy.ai
- **URL Shorteners**: Bit.ly, TinyURL, Custom domains

## Future Roadmap

### Emerging Platforms
- **Voice Social**: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces integration
- **AR/VR Social**: Meta Horizon, VRChat
- **Web3 Social**: Decentralized social networks
- **Live Streaming**: Twitch, YouTube Live, Instagram Live
- **Podcast Platforms**: Spotify, Apple Podcasts

### Advanced AI Features
- **Deepfake Detection**: Identify synthetic media
- **Real-time Translation**: Multi-language content management
- **Voice Synthesis**: AI-generated audio content
- **Visual AI**: Advanced image and video analysis
- **Behavioral Prediction**: Predict user engagement patterns
